data.eml:eml: A new species of porcelain crab, Petrolisthes tuerkayi n. sp. (Crustacea: Anomura: Porcellanidae), from the Persian Gulf

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Naderloo, Reza, Apel, Michael (2014): A new species of porcelain crab, Petrolisthes tuerkayi n. sp. (Crustacea: Anomura: Porcellanidae), from the Persian Gulf. Zootaxa 3881 (2): 190-194, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3881.2.7
